entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
